name: ButtonRole
desc: A value that describes the purpose of a button.

items.name: static let cancel: ButtonRole
items.desc: A role that indicates a button that cancels an operation.

items.name: static let destructive: ButtonRole
items.desc: A role that indicates a destructive button.

items.name: static func == (ButtonRole, ButtonRole) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two button roles are equal.

items.name: static func != (Self, Self) -> Bool
items.desc: Indicates whether two button roles are unequal.
